MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products.

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Version 1.2.0: Video file transcription (MP4/MKV/AVI/MOV), multi-language auto-detection, Right-Alt hold-to-talk mode, AI command mode, voice search, NVIDIA CUDA GPU support.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: .NET 8.0 Desktop Runtime (included in Full installer), Windows 10 or later, 4 GB RAM minimum (8 GB recommended)

English.Char_Desc_80: Offline AI speech recognition and transcription powered by OpenAI Whisper.
English.Char_Desc_250: RocketWhisper is a fully offline AI speech recognition and transcription app for Windows. Powered by OpenAI Whisper with NVIDIA GPU (CUDA) acceleration. Real-time voice typing, batch processing, video subtitles (SRT/VTT). One-time purchase.
English.Char_Desc_450: RocketWhisper is a desktop speech recognition and transcription application that runs 100% offline. Powered by OpenAI Whisper with NVIDIA GPU (CUDA) acceleration. Features: real-time voice typing with global hotkey, batch processing of audio/video files, subtitle export (SRT/VTT), AI text formatting via LLM integration, voice commands, custom vocabulary, and auto-correction. All processing happens locally, no data uploaded. One-time purchase.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
RocketWhisper is a powerful desktop speech recognition and transcription application that runs 100% offline on your computer. Your voice data never leaves your machine - complete privacy guaranteed.
Key Features: - Powered by OpenAI Whisper engine for high-accuracy speech recognition - NVIDIA GPU (CUDA) acceleration - up to 10x faster than CPU - Real-time voice-to-text input with global hotkey (Right-Alt hold-to-talk) - Batch processing for multiple audio and video files - Video file transcription: MP4, MKV, AVI, MOV, WebM, WMV, FLV - SRT/VTT subtitle export for video creators - AI formatting with LLM integration (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Groq, local LLM) - AI Command Mode: select text and give voice instructions for AI processing - Voice search: say "search for..." to instantly open browser search - Voice commands (new line, delete, period, etc.) - Auto-punctuation and auto-correction with regex support - Custom vocabulary for specialized terminology - Per-application processing modes - Voice launcher for opening apps by voice - Multi-language support with auto-detection (25+ languages) - Recording indicator with audio level visualization - System tray integration for background operation
Why RocketWhisper? - 100% Offline: No internet required. Your audio stays on your PC. - One-Time Purchase: No subscription fees. Pay once, use forever. - NVIDIA GPU Support: Blazing fast transcription with CUDA acceleration. - Privacy First: Zero data collection. No cloud processing.
Perfect for meeting transcription, interview transcription, video subtitle creation, real-time dictation, lecture notes, and accessibility.
Free 7-day trial with all features. Personal license: $32 USD. Business license: $399 USD (unlimited PCs).
